thread.title: Jim Carrey Carries Girlfriend's Coffin at Her Funeral in Ireland
thread.title_full: Jim Carrey Carries Girlfriend's Coffin at Her Funeral in Ireland

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jim Carrey Carries Girlfriend's Coffin at Her Funeral in Ireland
text:
Comments Jim Carrey helps carry Cathriona White's casket from Our Lady of Fatima Church to Cappawhite cemetery in her hometown. 
Jim Carrey was spotted at the funeral of his late girlfriend Cathriona White in her Irish hometown of Cappawhite on Saturday morning, October 10. Wearing a black suit, the Hollywood actor helped carry her coffin from the funeral service to the burial grounds. Carrey, 53, arrived in Ireland on Friday to join White's family for a wake before attending the Saturday funeral. He was accompanied by his 28-year-old daughter, Jane. "Love cannot be lost," he tweeted along with a silhouetted photo of him and White gazing at each other. Love cannot be lost.  pic.twitter.com/XxPYOhkdzc — Jim Carrey (@JimCarrey) October 10, 2015 Cathriona White was found dead on September 28 at her home in Sherman Oaks, Los Angeles. The 30-year-old make-up artist was found along with several suicide notes including one addressed to Carrey. She was married to another man at the time of her death. Family and friends gathered at her grandfather's funeral home on Friday to pay their final respect. The mourners walked her casket on Saturday from Our Lady of Fatima Church to a local cemetery where she was buried next to her father, Pat, who died three years ago. 
© AceShowbiz.com
